sentences.sContent: Each user should have access to a security level based upon the level of data sensitivity he or she can see.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each user should have access to a security level based upon the level of data sensitivity he or she can see.
sentences.sCn: 根据用户可以看到的数据的敏感性级别，每个用户都应该可以访问某个安全级别。

sentences.sContent: The authentication mode you choose for your environment will be determined by the level of sensitivity of your data.
sentences.sContent_eng: The authentication mode you choose for your environment will be determined by the level of sensitivity of your data.
sentences.sCn: 应该为您的环境选择什么样的身份验证模式，这是由数据的敏感级别来决定的。

sentences.sContent: The sensitivity of the test meets WHO standards for detecting the toxin in drinking water.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sensitivity of the test meets WHO standards for detecting the toxin in drinking water.
sentences.sCn: 这种测试的灵敏度满足了世界卫生组织探测饮用水毒物的标准。

phrases.pCn: 灵敏度分析；敏感性分析
敏感性测试；灵敏度试验
温度灵敏度，温度灵敏度系数；温度感受性
压感，压力灵敏度；声压灵敏度
切口灵敏度；缺口灵感度

words.tran: 敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的
明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人
